channel.title: Oasisctl on ArangoDB Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Oasisctl on ArangoDB Documentation

item.title: ArangoGraph Shell oasisctl
item.description: oasisctl ArangoGraph Insights Platform Synopsis ArangoGraph Insights Platform (formerly called Oasis): The Managed Cloud for ArangoDB oasisctl [flags] Options --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") -h, --help help for oasisctl --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl accept - Accept invites oasisctl add - Add resources oasisctl auditlog - AuditLog resources oasisctl backup - Backup commands oasisctl clone - Clone resources oasisctl completion - Generates bash completion scripts oasisctl create - Create resources oasisctl delete - Delete resources oasisctl disable - Disable some settings related to deployment oasisctl enable - Enable some settings related to deployment oasisctl generate-docs - Generate output oasisctl get - Get information oasisctl import - Import data from a local database or from another remote database into an Oasis deployment.

item.title: Oasisctl Accept
item.description: oasisctl accept Accept invites oasisctl accept [flags] Options -h, --help help for accept Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform oasisctl accept organization - Accept organization related invites

item.title: Oasisctl Add
item.description: oasisctl add Add resources oasisctl add [flags] Options -h, --help help for add Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform oasisctl add auditlog - Add auditlog resources oasisctl add group - Add group resources

item.title: Oasisctl Audit Log
item.description: oasisctl auditlog AuditLog resources oasisctl auditlog [flags] Options -h, --help help for auditlog Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform oasisctl auditlog attach - Attach a project to an audit log oasisctl auditlog detach - Detach a project from an auditlog oasisctl auditlog get - Audit log get resources

item.title: Oasisctl Backup
item.description: oasisctl backup Backup commands oasisctl backup [flags] Options -h, --help help for backup Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform oasisctl backup copy - Copy a backup from source backup to given region oasisctl backup download - Download a backup

item.title: Oasisctl Clone
item.description: oasisctl clone Clone resources oasisctl clone [flags] Options -h, --help help for clone Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform oasisctl clone deployment - Clone deployment resources

item.title: Oasisctl Completion
item.description: oasisctl completion Generates bash completion scripts Synopsis To load completion run . <(oasisctl completion [bash|fish|powershell|zsh]) To configure your bash shell to load completions for each session add to your bashrc # ~/.bashrc or ~/.profile . <(oasisctl completion bash) oasisctl completion [flags] Options -h, --help help for completion Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform

item.title: Oasisctl Create
item.description: oasisctl create Create resources oasisctl create [flags] Options -h, --help help for create Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform oasisctl create apikey - Create a new API key oasisctl create auditlog - Create an auditlog oasisctl create backup - Create backup … oasisctl create cacertificate - Create a new CA certificate oasisctl create deployment - Create a new deployment oasisctl create example - Create example … oasisctl create group - Create a new group oasisctl create ipallowlist - Create a new IP allowlist oasisctl create metrics - Create metrics resources oasisctl create notebook - Create a new notebook oasisctl create organization - Create a new organization oasisctl create private - Create private resources oasisctl create project - Create a new project oasisctl create role - Create a new role

item.title: Oasisctl Delete
item.description: oasisctl delete Delete resources oasisctl delete [flags] Options -h, --help help for delete Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform oasisctl delete apikey - Delete an API key with given identifier oasisctl delete auditlog - Delete an auditlog oasisctl delete backup - Delete a backup for a given ID.

item.title: Oasisctl Disable
item.description: oasisctl disable Disable some settings related to deployment oasisctl disable [flags] Options -h, --help help for disable Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform oasisctl disable scheduled-root-password-rotation - Disable scheduled root password rotation

item.title: Oasisctl Enable
item.description: oasisctl enable Enable some settings related to deployment oasisctl enable [flags] Options -h, --help help for enable Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform oasisctl enable scheduled-root-password-rotation - Enable scheduled root password rotation

item.title: Oasisctl Generate Documentation
item.description: oasisctl generate-docs Generate output oasisctl generate-docs [flags] Options -h, --help help for generate-docs -l, --link-file-ext string What file extensions the links should point to -o, --output-dir string Output directory (default "./docs") -r, --replace-underscore-with string Replace the underscore in links with the given character Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform

item.title: Oasisctl Get
item.description: oasisctl get Get information oasisctl get [flags] Options -h, --help help for get Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform oasisctl get auditlog - Get auditlog archive oasisctl get backup - Get a backup oasisctl get cacertificate - Get a CA certificate the authenticated user has access to oasisctl get deployment - Get a deployment the authenticated user has access to oasisctl get example - Get a single example dataset oasisctl get group - Get a group the authenticated user has access to oasisctl get ipallowlist - Get an IP allowlist the authenticated user has access to oasisctl get metrics - Get metrics information oasisctl get notebook - Get a notebook oasisctl get organization - Get an organization the authenticated user is a member of oasisctl get policy - Get a policy the authenticated user has access to oasisctl get private - Get private information oasisctl get project - Get a project the authenticated user has access to oasisctl get provider - Get a provider the authenticated user has access to oasisctl get region - Get a region the authenticated user has access to oasisctl get role - Get a role the authenticated user has access to oasisctl get self - Get information about the authenticated user oasisctl get server - Get server information oasisctl get tandc - Get current terms and conditions or get one by ID

item.title: Oasisctl Import
item.description: oasisctl import Import data from a local database or from another remote database into an Oasis deployment. oasisctl import [flags] Options -b, --batch-size int The number of documents to write at once. (default 4096) -d, --destination-deployment-id string Destination deployment id to import data into. It can be provided instead of address, username and password. --excluded-collection strings A list of collections names which should be excluded. Exclusion takes priority over inclusion.

item.title: Oasisctl List
item.description: oasisctl list List resources oasisctl list [flags] Options -h, --help help for list Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform oasisctl list apikeys - List all API keys created for the current user oasisctl list arangodb - List ArangoDB information oasisctl list auditlog - List resources for auditlogs oasisctl list auditlogs - List auditlogs oasisctl list backup - A list command for various backup resources oasisctl list backups - List backups oasisctl list cacertificates - List all CA certificates of the given project oasisctl list cpusizes - List CPU sizes oasisctl list deployments - List all deployments of the given project oasisctl list diskperformances - List disk performances oasisctl list effective - List effective information oasisctl list example - List example … oasisctl list examples - List all example datasets oasisctl list group - List group resources oasisctl list groups - List all groups of the given organization oasisctl list ipallowlists - List all IP allowlists of the given project oasisctl list metrics - List metrics resources oasisctl list nodesizes - List node sizes oasisctl list notebookmodels - List notebook models oasisctl list notebooks - List notebooks oasisctl list organization - List organization resources oasisctl list organizations - List all organizations the authenticated user is a member of oasisctl list permissions - List the known permissions oasisctl list projects - List all projects of the given organization oasisctl list providers - List all providers the authenticated user has access to oasisctl list regions - List all regions of the given provider oasisctl list roles - List all roles of the given organization oasisctl list servers - List servers information

item.title: Oasisctl Lock
item.description: oasisctl lock Lock resources oasisctl lock [flags] Options -h, --help help for lock Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform oasisctl lock cacertificate - Lock a CA certificate, so it cannot be deleted oasisctl lock deployment - Lock a deployment, so it cannot be deleted oasisctl lock ipallowlist - Lock an IP allowlist, so it cannot be deleted oasisctl lock organization - Lock an organization, so it cannot be deleted oasisctl lock policy - Lock a backup policy oasisctl lock project - Lock a project, so it cannot be deleted

item.title: Oasisctl Login
item.description: oasisctl login Login to ArangoDB Oasis using an API key Synopsis To authenticate in a script environment, run: export OASIS_TOKEN=$(oasisctl login --key-id=<your-key-id> --key-secret=<your-key-secret>) oasisctl login [flags] Options -h, --help help for login -i, --key-id string API key identifier -s, --key-secret string API key secret Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform

item.title: Oasisctl Logs
item.description: oasisctl logs Get logs of the servers of a deployment the authenticated user has access to oasisctl logs [flags] Options -d, --deployment-id string Identifier of the deployment --end string End fetching logs at this timestamp (pass timestamp or duration before now) --format string Formatting of the log output. It can be one of two: text, json. Text is the default value. (default "text") -h, --help help for logs -l, --limit int Limit the number of log lines -o, --organization-id string Identifier of the organization -p, --project-id string Identifier of the project -r, --role string Limit logs to servers with given role only (agents|coordinators|dbservers) --start string Start fetching logs from this timestamp (pass timestamp or duration before now) Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.

item.title: Oasisctl Pause
item.description: oasisctl pause Pause resources oasisctl pause [flags] Options -h, --help help for pause Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform oasisctl pause notebook - Pause a notebook

item.title: Oasisctl Rebalance
item.description: oasisctl rebalance Rebalance resources oasisctl rebalance [flags] Options -h, --help help for rebalance Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform oasisctl rebalance deployment - Rebalance deployment resources

item.title: Oasisctl Reject
item.description: oasisctl reject Reject invites oasisctl reject [flags] Options -h, --help help for reject Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform oasisctl reject organization - Reject organization related invites

item.title: Oasisctl Renew
item.description: oasisctl renew Renew keys & tokens oasisctl renew [flags] Options -h, --help help for renew Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform oasisctl renew apikey - Renew API keys & tokens

item.title: Oasisctl Resume
item.description: oasisctl resume Resume resources oasisctl resume [flags] Options -h, --help help for resume Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform oasisctl resume deployment - Resume a paused deployment the authenticated user has access to oasisctl resume notebook - Resume a notebook

item.title: Oasisctl Revoke
item.description: oasisctl revoke Revoke keys & tokens oasisctl revoke [flags] Options -h, --help help for revoke Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform oasisctl revoke apikey - Revoke an API key with given identifier oasisctl revoke metrics - Revoke keys & tokens

item.title: Oasisctl Rotate
item.description: oasisctl rotate Rotate resources oasisctl rotate [flags] Options -h, --help help for rotate Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform oasisctl rotate deployment - Rotate deployment resources

item.title: Oasisctl Top
item.description: oasisctl top Show the most important server metrics oasisctl top [flags] Options -d, --deployment-id string Identifier of the deployment -h, --help help for top -o, --organization-id string Identifier of the organization -p, --project-id string Identifier of the project Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform

item.title: Oasisctl Unlock
item.description: oasisctl unlock Unlock resources oasisctl unlock [flags] Options -h, --help help for unlock Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform oasisctl unlock cacertificate - Unlock a CA certificate, so it can be deleted oasisctl unlock deployment - Unlock a deployment, so it can be deleted oasisctl unlock ipallowlist - Unlock an IP allowlist, so it can be deleted oasisctl unlock organization - Unlock an organization, so it can be deleted oasisctl unlock policy - Unlock a backup policy oasisctl unlock project - Unlock a project, so it can be deleted

item.title: Oasisctl Update
item.description: oasisctl update Update resources oasisctl update [flags] Options -h, --help help for update Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform oasisctl update auditlog - Update an auditlog oasisctl update backup - Update a backup oasisctl update cacertificate - Update a CA certificate the authenticated user has access to oasisctl update deployment - Update a deployment the authenticated user has access to oasisctl update group - Update a group the authenticated user has access to oasisctl update ipallowlist - Update an IP allowlist the authenticated user has access to oasisctl update metrics - Update metrics resources oasisctl update notebook - Update notebook oasisctl update organization - Update an organization the authenticated user has access to oasisctl update policy - Update a policy oasisctl update private - Update private resources oasisctl update project - Update a project the authenticated user has access to oasisctl update role - Update a role the authenticated user has access to

item.title: Oasisctl Upgrade
item.description: oasisctl upgrade Upgrade Oasisctl tool Synopsis Check the latest, compatible version and upgrade this tool to that. oasisctl upgrade [flags] Options -d, --dry-run Do an upgrade without applying the version. -f, --force Force an upgrade even if the versions match. -h, --help help for upgrade Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform

item.title: Oasisctl Version
item.description: oasisctl version Show the current version of this tool oasisctl version [flags] Options -h, --help help for version Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform

item.title: Oasisctl Wait
item.description: oasisctl wait Wait for a status change oasisctl wait [flags] Options -h, --help help for wait Options Inherited From Parent Commands --endpoint string API endpoint of the ArangoDB Oasis (default "api.cloud.arangodb.com") --format string Output format (table|json) (default "table") --token string Token used to authenticate at ArangoDB Oasis See also oasisctl - ArangoGraph Insights Platform oasisctl wait deployment - Wait for a deployment to reach the ready status
